Class QuizViewController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.QuizViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class QuizViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for handling student interactions in the quiz view.
